board.name: CYW920706WCDEVAL
board.summary: The Cypress CYW920706WCDEVAL Evaluation Kit enables you to evaluate and develop single-chip Bluetooth applications using the CYW20706, an ultra-low-power dual-mode Bluetooth 5.2 wireless MCU device. The CYW20706 is a stand-alone baseband processor with an integrated 2.4 GHz transceiver supporting LE/BR/EDR. The CYW20706 employs high integration to reduce external components, thereby minimizing the device's footprint and cost. This kit helps evaluate device functionality and develop applications quickly for faster time-to-market.
board.prov_capabilities: ble br_edr mesh hid audio ota hal btsdk CYW920706WCDEVAL
board.description:
Kit Features:
  • CYW20706 is a monolithic, single chip, Bluetooth dual-mode System-on-a-Chip (SoC) that includes a baseband processor, an ARM® Cortex™-M3 processor, and an integrated transceiver.
  • The Cypress CYW920706WCDEVAL board is an evaluation board that provides various pins, jumpers, switches, ports, and test points to access CYW20706 to perform debug, evaluation, and troubleshooting.

board.name: CYBT-353027-EVAL
board.summary: The Cypress CYBT-353027-EVAL Kit enables you to evaluate and develop single-chip Bluetooth applications using the CYW20706, an ultra-low-power dual-mode Bluetooth 5.0 wireless MCU device. The CYW20706 is a stand-alone baseband processor with an integrated 2.4 GHz transceiver supporting LE/BR/EDR. The CYW20706 employs high integration to reduce external components, thereby minimizing the device's footprint and cost. This kit helps evaluate device functionality and develop applications quickly for faster time-to-market.
board.prov_capabilities: ble br_edr mesh hid audio ota hal btsdk CYBT_353027_EVAL
board.description:
Kit Features:
  • CYW20706 is a monolithic, single chip, Bluetooth dual-mode System-on-a-Chip (SoC) that includes a baseband processor, an ARM® Cortex™-M3 processor, and an integrated transceiver.
  • The EZ-BT Module Arduino Evaluation Board (CYBT-353027-EVAL) enables you to evaluate and develop applications on the EZ-BT WICED Module, CYBT-353027-02. CYBT-353027-EVAL can be used as a standalone evaluation kit or can be combined with Arduino compatible shields.

board.name: CYW920819EVB-02
board.summary: The Cypress CYW920819EVB-02 Evaluation Kit enables you to evaluate and develop single-chip Bluetooth applications using the CYW20819, an ultra-low-power dual-mode Bluetooth 5.2 wireless MCU device. The CYW20819 is a stand-alone baseband processor with an integrated 2.4 GHz transceiver supporting LE/BR/EDR. Manufactured using advanced CMOS low-power process, the CYW20819 employs high integration to reduce external components, thereby minimizing the device's footprint and cost. This kit helps evaluate device functionality and develop applications quickly for faster time-to-market.
board.prov_capabilities: ble br_edr mesh hid audio ota hal btsdk CYW920819EVB_02 fw2 lsm9ds1 ncu15wf104 led2x button CYW208XX CYW208XX_62fbga
board.description:
Kit Features:
  • 62-FBGA CYW20819 dual-mode (LE/BR/EDR) Bluetooth 5.2-compliant wireless MCU
  • Arduino compatible headers for hardware expansion
  • On-board sensors - a lsm9ds1 9-axis motion sensor (3D digital linear acceleration sensor, 3D digital angular rate sensor, and 3D digital magnetic sensor) and a ncu15wf104 thermistor
  • User switches and LEDs
  • USB connector for power, programming, and USB-UART bridge

Kit Contents:
  • CYW920819EVB-02 Evaluation board
  • USB Standard-A to Micro-B cable
  • Quick Start Guide

board.name: CYBT-213043-MESH
board.summary: The EZ-BT Mesh Evaluation Kit (CYBT-213043-MESH) enables you to evaluate SIG Mesh functionality and features using the EZ-BT WICED Module CYBT-213043-02. The CYBT-213043-02 EZ-BT WICED Module is an integrated, fully certified, 12.0 mm x 16.61 mm x 1.70 mm, programmable dual-mode Bluetooth(R) module designed to reduce your time-to-market. The CYBT-213043-02 module utilizes the Cypress CYW20819 silicon device.
board.prov_capabilities: ble br_edr mesh hid ota hal btsdk fw2 CYBT_213043_MESH
board.description:
Kit Features:
  • CYW20819-based dual-mode (LE/BR/EDR) Bluetooth 5.0-compliant fully certified module (CYBT-213043-02)
  • On-Board Sensor for Mesh Application Development (Thermistor, ALS, PIR Motion Sensor)
  • On-Board RGB LED with additional 1MB External Serial Flash
  • Bluetooth Low Energy (LE), Bluetooth Basic Rate (BR) and Enhanced Data Rate (EDR)
  • FCC, ISED, MIC, and CE Certified Module on board (CYBT-213043-02)
  • Bluetooth 5.0 with SIG MESH Qualified Module (CYBT-213043-02)
  • USB connector for power, programming, and USB-UART bridge
Kit Contents:
  • 4x Mesh Evaluation Boards
  • 4x USB-A to USB Micro-B Cables
  • 1x Quick Start Guide

board.name: CYBT-213043-EVAL
board.summary: The Cypress CYBT-213043-EVAL Evaluation Kit enables you to evaluate and develop single-chip Bluetooth applications using the EZ-BT WICED Module CYBT-213043-02. The CYBT-213043-02 EZ-BT WICED Module is an integrated, fully certified, 12.0 mm x 16.61 mm x 1.70 mm, programmable dual-mode Bluetooth module designed to reduce your time-to-market. The CYBT-213043-02 module utilizes the Cypress CYW20819 silicon device. Manufactured using advanced CMOS low-power process, the CYW20819 employs high integration to reduce external components, thereby minimizing the device's footprint and cost. This kit helps evaluate device functionality and develop applications quickly for faster time-to-market.

  • USB Standard-A to Micro-B cable

board.summary: The Cypress CYBT-273063-EVAL Evaluation Kit enables you to evaluate and develop single-chip Bluetooth applications using the EZ-BT WICED Module CYBT-273063-02. The CYBT-273063-02 EZ-BT WICED Module is an integrated, fully certified, 12.5 mm x 19 mm x 1.95 mm , programmable dual-mode Bluetooth module with external PA/LNA and PCB Antenna designed to reduce your time-to-market. The CYBT-273063-02 module utilizes the Cypress CYW20819 silicon device. Manufactured using advanced CMOS low-power process, the CYW20819 employs high integration to reduce external components, thereby minimizing the device's footprint and cost. This kit helps evaluate device functionality and develop applications quickly for faster time-to-market.

board.description:

  • Arduino compatible headers for hardware expansion
  • User switches and LEDs
  • FCC, ISED, MIC, and CE Certified Module on board (CYBT-273063-02)

board.name: CYW920819REF-KB-01
board.summary: The Cypress CYW920819REF-KB-01 Reference Keyboard enables you to evaluate and develop single-chip Bluetooth HID keyboard device applications using the CYW9208XXWCD1 module, a 112-pin module utilizing the Cypress CYW20819 silicon, an ultra-low-power dual-mode Bluetooth 5.2 wireless MCU device. The CYW20819 is a stand-alone baseband processor with an integrated 2.4 GHz transceiver supporting LE/BR/EDR.
board.prov_capabilities: hid ota btsdk fw2 CYW920819REF_KB_01

  • 112-pin CYW20819 module dual-mode (LE/BR/EDR) Bluetooth 5.2-compliant wireless MCU with internal Power Amplifier (iPA)
  • Keyboard hardware
  • USB connector for power, programming, and USB-UART bridge

board.name: CYW920820EVB-02
board.summary: The Cypress CYW920820EVB-02 Evaluation Kit enables you to evaluate and develop single-chip Bluetooth applications using the CYW20820, an ultra-low-power dual-mode Bluetooth 5.2 wireless MCU device. The CYW20820 is a stand-alone baseband processor with an integrated 2.4 GHz transceiver supporting LE/BR/EDR. The CYW20820 delivers up to 10.5 dBm Tx power in LE and BR modes and up to 4 dBm in EDR mode that extends range in applications like home and industrial automation, wearables, toys, and HID. The CYW20820 employs high integration to reduce external components, thereby minimizing the device's footprint and cost. This kit helps evaluate device functionality and develop applications quickly for faster time-to-market.
board.prov_capabilities: ble br_edr mesh hid audio ota hal btsdk fw2 CYW920820EVB_02 lsm9ds1 ncu15wf104 led2x button CYW208XX CYW208XX_62fbga
board.description:
Kit Features:
  • 62-FBGA CYW20820 dual-mode (LE/BR/EDR) Bluetooth 5.2-compliant wireless MCU with internal Power Amplifier (iPA)
  • Arduino compatible headers for hardware expansion
  • On-board sensors - a lsm9ds1 9-axis motion sensor (3D digital linear acceleration sensor, 3D digital angular rate sensor, and 3D digital magnetic sensor) and a ncu15wf104 thermistor
  • User switches and LEDs
  • USB connector for power, programming, and USB-UART bridge

Kit Contents:
  • CYW920820EVB-02 Evaluation board
  • USB Standard-A to Micro-B cable
  • Quick Start Guide

board.name: CYW989820EVB-01
board.summary: The Cypress CYW989820EVB-01 Evaluation Kit enables you to evaluate and develop single-chip Bluetooth applications using the CYW89820, an Automotive qualified dual-mode Bluetooth 5.2 wireless SoC device. The CYW89820 is a stand-alone baseband processor with an integrated 2.4 GHz transceiver supporting LE/BR/EDR. The CYW89820 delivers up to 10.5 dBm Tx power in LE and BR modes and up to 4 dBm in EDR mode that extends range in applications like Automotive Keyless Entry, Remote Parking, Sensor Control, Wake-up trigger for Telematics units etc. The CYW89820 employs high integration to reduce external components, thereby minimizing the device's footprint and cost. This kit helps evaluate device functionality and develop applications quickly for faster time-to-market.
board.prov_capabilities: ble br_edr mesh hid ota peps hal btsdk fw2 CYW989820EVB_01 CYW208XX
board.description:
Kit Features:
  • 48-WQFN CYW89820 dual-mode (LE/BR/EDR) Bluetooth 5.2-compliant wireless MCU with internal Power Amplifier (iPA)
  • Arduino compatible headers for hardware expansion
  • On-board sensors - a 9-axis motion sensor (3D digital linear acceleration sensor, 3D digital angular rate sensor, and 3D digital magnetic sensor) and a thermistor
  • User switches and LEDs
  • USB connector for power, programming, and USB-UART bridge

Kit Contents:
  • CYW989820EVB-01 Evaluation board
  • USB Standard-A to Micro-B cable
  • Quick Start Guide

board.name: CYW9M2BASE-43012BT
board.summary: The Cypress CYW9M2BASE-43012BT is a prototyping kit that enables the design and debug of Bluetooth applications using the CYW43012 (Wi-Fi + Bluetooth Combo), an ultra-low-power dual-mode Bluetooth 5.2 wireless MCU device. The CYW43012 is a stand-alone baseband processor with an integrated 2.4 GHz transceiver supporting LE/BR/EDR. The kit includes an Audio Arduino shield with on-board microphones, audio codec chip, and headphone output.
board.prov_capabilities: ble br_edr audio btsdk CYW9M2BASE_43012BT
board.description:
Kit Features:
  • CYW43012 is a monolithic, single chip, Wi-Fi + Bluetooth Combo dual-mode System-on-a-Chip (SoC) that includes a baseband processor, an ARM® Cortex™-M4 processor, and an integrated transceiver.
  • The Cypress CYW9M2BASE-43012BT board is a prototyping kit that enables the design and debug of Bluetooth applications using the CYW43012.

board.name: CYW943012BTEVK-01
board.summary: The Infineon CYW943012BTEVK-01 Evaluation kit enables you to evaluate and develop Bluetooth applications using the CYW43012 (802.11n/802.11ac-Friendly Dual-Band Wi-Fi and Bluetooth Combo) The CYW43012 is a 28-nm, ultra-low power single-chip device with an integrated Bluetooth subsystem supporting LE/BR/EDR. This kit helps evaluate device functionality and develop embedded Bluetooth applications quickly for faster time-to-market.
board.prov_capabilities: ble br_edr audio btsdk CYW943012BTEVK_01
board.description:
Kit Features:
  • CYW43012 single chip, Wi-Fi + Bluetooth Combo System-on-a-Chip (SoC) that includes a baseband processor, an ARM® Cortex™-M4 processor, and an integrated transceiver.
  • Audio Arduino shield with on-board analog microphones, audio codec chip, headphone and speaker output.
  • On-board sensors: an ambient light sensor, thermistor, and Infineon IM69D127 digital microphone.
  • User switches and LEDs.
  • USB connector for power, programming, and USB-UART bridge.

Kit Contents:
  • CYW9BTM2BASE1 Baseboard
  • CYW943012M2BT1LV radio card (pre-assembled on baseboard M.2 connector)
  • CYW9BT Audio 3 Arduino shield
  • USB Standard-A to Micro-B cable
  • Power Adapter

board.name: CYW920719B2Q40EVB-01
board.summary: The Cypress CYW920719B2Q40EVB-01 Evaluation Kit enables you to evaluate and develop single-chip Bluetooth applications using the CYW20719, an ultra-low-power dual-mode Bluetooth 5.1 wireless MCU device. The CYW20719 is a stand-alone baseband processor with an integrated 2.4 GHz transceiver supporting LE/BR/EDR. The CYW20719 employs high integration to reduce external components, thereby minimizing the device's footprint and cost. This kit helps evaluate device functionality and develop applications quickly for faster time-to-market.
board.prov_capabilities: ble br_edr mesh hid audio ota hal btsdk fw2 led2x button CYW920719B2Q40EVB_01 lsm9ds1 ncu15wf104
board.description:
Kit Features:
  • 40-QFN CYW20719 dual-mode (LE/BR/EDR) Bluetooth 5.1-compliant wireless MCU
  • Arduino compatible headers for hardware expansion
  • On-board sensors - a lsm9ds1 9-axis motion sensor (3D digital linear acceleration sensor, 3D digital angular rate sensor, and 3D digital magnetic sensor) and a ncu15wf104 thermistor
  • User switches and LEDs
  • USB connector for power, programming, and USB-UART bridge

Kit Contents:
  • CYW920719B2Q40EVB-01 Evaluation board
  • USB Standard-A to Micro-B cable
  • Quick Start Guide

The CYBT-423054-02 is a dual-mode Bluetooth BR/EDR and Low Energy (LE) wireless module solution. The CYBT-423054-02 includes onboard crystal oscillators, passive components, and the Cypress CYW20719B2 silicon device.
board.prov_capabilities: ble br_edr btsdk CYBT_423054_EVAL
board.description:

  • Evaluation board can be used as a standalone evaluation kit or can be combined with Arduino compatible shields
  • User defined switch and LED
  • USB connector for power and programming

Kit Contents:
  • EZ-BT Module Evaluation board (CYBT-423504-EVAL) with on board module (CYBT-423504-02)
  • USB Standard-A to Micro-B cable

board.name: CYW920721B2EVK-02
board.summary: The Cypress CYW920721B2EVK-02 Evaluation Kit enables you to evaluate and develop single-chip Bluetooth applications using the CYW20721, an ultra-low-power dual-mode Bluetooth 5.1 wireless MCU device for audio. The CYW20721 is a stand-alone baseband processor with an integrated 2.4 GHz transceiver supporting LE/BR/EDR. The CYW20721 employs high integration to reduce external components, thereby minimizing the device's footprint and cost. This kit helps evaluate device functionality and develop applications quickly for faster time-to-market.
board.prov_capabilities: ble br_edr mesh hid audio ota hal btsdk fw2 CYW920721B2EVK_02
board.description:
Kit Features:
  • CYW20721B2 dual-mode (LE/BR/EDR) Bluetooth 5.1-compliant wireless MCU packaged into a SiP Module with external Low Noise Amplifier and Power Amplifier (eLNA/ePA)
  • Audio Arduino shield with on-board microphones, audio codec chip, headphone and speaker output
  • On-board sensors - a 9-axis motion sensor (3D digital linear acceleration sensor, 3D digital angular rate sensor, and 3D digital magnetic sensor) and a thermistor
  • User switches and LEDs
  • USB connector for power, programming, and USB-UART bridge

Kit Contents:
  • CYW920721B2EVK-02 Evaluation board
  • CYW9BT Audio 2 Arduino shield (pre-assembled on top of the CYW920721B2EVK-02 evaluation board
  • USB Standard-A to Micro-B cable
  • Power Adapter
  • Quick Start Guide

board.name: CYW920721M2EVK-01
board.summary: The Cypress CYW920721M2EVK-01 Evaluation Kit enables you to evaluate and develop single-chip Bluetooth applications using the CYW20721, an ultra-low-power dual-mode Bluetooth 5.1 wireless MCU device for audio. The CYW20721 is a stand-alone baseband processor with an integrated 2.4 GHz transceiver supporting BR/EDR/Bluetooth LE. The CYW20721 employs high integration to reduce external components, thereby minimizing the device's footprint and cost. This kit helps evaluate device functionality and develop applications quickly for faster time-to-market.
board.prov_capabilities: ble br_edr mesh hid audio ota hal btsdk fw2 CYW920721M2EVK_01
board.description:
Kit Features:
  • CYW20721B2 dual-mode (Bluetooth LE/BR/EDR) Bluetooth 5.1-compliant wireless MCU with external 8TR8211C Low Noise Amplifier and Power Amplifier (eLNA/ePA)
  • Audio Arduino shield with on-board microphones, audio codec chip, headphone and speaker output
  • On-board sensors - an ambient light sensor, thermistor, and footprint for an Infineon digital microphone
  • User switches and LEDs
  • USB connector for power, programming, and USB-UART bridge

Kit Contents:
  • CYW920721M2EVK-01 Evaluation board
  • CYW9BT Audio 3 Arduino shield (pre-assembled on top of the CYW920721M2EVK-01 evaluation board
  • USB Standard-A to Micro-B cable
  • Power Adapter
  • Quick Start Guide

The CYW20721 is a stand-alone baseband processor with an integrated 2.4 GHz transceiver supporting LE/BR/EDR. The CYW20721 employs high integration to reduce external components, thereby minimizing the device's footprint and cost. board.prov_capabilities: ble br_edr mesh hid audio ota hal btsdk fw2 CYW920721M2EVK_02
board.description:
Kit Features:
  • CYW20721B2 dual-mode (Bluetooth LE/BR/EDR) Bluetooth 5.1-compliant wireless MCU packaged into a SiP Module with external 8TR8211C Low Noise Amplifier and Power Amplifier (eLNA/ePA)
  • Audio Arduino shield with on-board microphones, audio codec chip, headphone and speaker output
  • On-board sensors - an ambient light sensor, thermistor, and footprint for an Infineon digital microphone
  • User switches and LEDs

bsp_gen2 btsdk_empty_app spp btsdk_ota_app anc ans batc bats beacon helloc hellos hrs hrc adc gpio i2c_master puart pwm ble_mouse ble_remote keyboard dimmer light_dimmable on_off_switch mesh_snip

board.name: CYW920735Q60EVB-01
board.summary: The Cypress CYW920735Q60EVB-01 Evaluation Kit enables you to evaluate and develop single-chip Bluetooth applications using the CYW20735, an ultra-low-power dual-mode Bluetooth 5.0 wireless MCU device. The CYW20735 is a stand-alone baseband processor with an integrated 2.4 GHz transceiver supporting BR and LE. EDR is not supported. The CYW20735 employs high integration to reduce external components, thereby minimizing the device's footprint and cost. The device includes several on-chip peripherals including a hardware key scanner, PWMs, and an ADC. The device also includes an analog microphone interface that provides a low-cost solution for voice-enabled remotes as well as Internet of Things (IoT) gadgets and toys. This kit helps evaluate device functionality and develop applications quickly for faster time-to-market.
board.prov_capabilities: ble br_edr mesh hid audio ota hal btsdk fw2 led2x CYW920735Q60EVB_01 lsm9ds1 ncu15wf104
board.description:
Kit Features:
  • CYW20735 is a monolithic, single chip, Bluetooth dual-mode System-on-a-Chip (SoC) that includes a baseband processor, an ARM® Cortex™-M4 processor, and an integrated transceiver.
  • The Cypress CYW920735Q60EVB-01 board is an evaluation board that provides various pins, jumpers, switches, ports, and test points to access CYW20735 to perform debug, evaluation, and troubleshooting.

version.prov_capabilities_per_version: bsp_gen2 btsdk_empty_app ble_rcu
bsp_gen2 btsdk_empty_app ble_rcu
bsp_gen2 btsdk_empty_app ble_rcu

board.name: CYW920835REF-RCU-01
board.summary: The Cypress CYW920835REF-RCU-01 Reference remote enables you to evaluate and develop single-chip Bluetooth Low Energy remote device applications using the CYW20835, an ultra-low-power Bluetooth Low Energy 5.2 wireless MCU device. The CYW20835 is a stand-alone baseband processor with an integrated 2.4 GHz transceiver supporting LE. The CYW20835 employs high integration to reduce external components, thereby minimizing the device's footprint and cost. This kit helps evaluate device functionality and develop remote applications quickly for faster time-to-market.
board.prov_capabilities: ble hid audio ota hal btsdk fw2 CYW920835REF_RCU_01
board.description:
Kit Features:
  • 60-QFN CYW20835B1 Bluetooth Low Energy 5.2-compliant wireless MCU
  • Reference remote hardware
  • Analog microphone
  • 16 buttons: Power, Voice, Up, Down, Left, Right, Select, Back, Home, Menu, Rewind, Play/Pause, Fast Forward, VOL+, VOL-, Mute
  • LEDs for debug only
  • USB connector for power, programming, and USB-UART bridge
